ComicInfo.Title: The Landscape of Fear
ComicInfo.Summary: In “The Landscape of Fear,” the Crystal City, last refuge of the Autobots, is under siege. But with the arrival of last-minute reinforcements, do they have what it takes to turn the tide of battle in their favor? And what of the other threats to Cybertron—Insecticlone swarms, rust worms, and a great evil reborn?!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 19:01:00. [CVDB912285]
ComicInfo.Colorist: David Garcia Cruz, Priscilla Tramontano, Thomas Deer
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Ed Pirrie, Juan Samu, Priscilla Tramontano, Thomas Deer, Umi Miyao
ComicInfo.Editor: David Mariotte, Riley Farmer, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.Characters: Airwave, Apeface, Arcee, Blitzwing, Chromia, Computron, Elita-One, Gears, Greenlight, Hound, Ironhide, Jumpstream, Lightbright , Lodestar, Megatron, Obsidian, Optimus Prime, Pyra Magna , Ratchet, Road Rage, Rust Dust , Scattershot, Sky Lynx, Strika, Tap-Out, Termagax, Ultra Magnus, Wheeljack
